So angels can really change their appearance? Or become invisible?
Invisible to you. I can still see them in their spiritual form, retreating from battle.
Why don't you change your appearance to be something more scary?

You found the etching "The Archangel Raphael" (1660) by Rembrandt!
"Raphael" means "God heals". He is known in some Scriptures as an angel of _.
Raphael is most closely associated with healing!

The best way to know if one of them is your enemy is to wait and see if they start hitting you.
Thank you, friends! I... didn't want to have to fight them. But...
I tried and I tried to get them to see things from the Teacher's perspective, but they refused.
It's like they've closed their eyes to the truth completely. How could someone do that?
Truth is a matter of perspective.
Sin blinds us to the truth.
Truth is a matter of perspective.
Yes, I suppose you're right. I only hope I always stay close enough to our Teacher to see from the clearest point of view.
Sin blinds us to the truth.
Yes, it's all about keeping a pure heart and letting the Teacher guide our thoughts.
I wish the others had been able to keep the right attitude about humans.
What are humans doing here already, I wonder. I'll have to ask the Teacher when we see Him.
I'm sure it was another of His great ideas to bring you here.
Everything He does is to teach us something and show us how much He cares for us, even if Lucifer and the others can't see that.
Speaking of teaching and care, do you mind if I show you something?
Our words can Encourage people to see the truth about themselves and God.
We can guide them back to right thinking if they get Lured Astray or lost in Darkness, Depressed, or Intimidated.
Excellent! Ready to go meet the Teacher?
Hey, did you notice you can use some Items from the Menu when we're not in battle? That way, we can heal before battle.
Hey, did you notice you can use some Items from the Menu when we're not in battle? That way, we can heal before battle.
